ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] New, lost, confused, aiyee....
ygData.msgSnippet: Were you able to get in on the skele kill fest and mega sweet loot action? They did a cool little Holloween thing where there were Skeletal armies poping up on
ygData.messageBody:
Were you able to get in on the skele kill fest and mega sweet loot
action? They did a cool little Holloween thing where there were Skeletal
armies poping up on all the newbie zones and the Skeletal Comanders
would drop some awsome twink gear! It was still going on last night so
check it out and see if it's still going on and get some cool stuff!

Oh and if you are lower than lvl50, I would suggest grouping or get a
higher level to assist you. Those Skeles hit HARD!

LAter!
Durgaa
Ranger of the 34th season

(See her stats here:)
http://www.magelo.com/eq_view_profile.html?num=1104784
